title: Box, 1986-113-12, 1880
markings: Marks: Stamped reverse of bowl: "[lion passant]/[anchor]/ G (Gorham mark)/ STERLING."
description: Rectangular box with maroon velvet on top and sides. Faded maroon plain fabric on underside. Two metal (brass?) security closures at front, two small hinges at back. Inside base lined in shirred blue satin with shaped "backbone" to hold 12 spoons. Inside cover with floral brocade in red and blue, and shirred yellow satin in two rectangles. Rectangular box with maroon velvet on top and sides. Faded maroon plain fabric underside. Two metal (brass?) security closures at front, and two small hinges at back. Inside base lined in shirred blue satin with shaped "backbone" to hold 12 spoons (two lacking in set). Inside case cover with floral brocade in red and blue, and shirred yellow satin in two rectangles.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
